description:
The Arc’teryx Skaha Harness is a durable and ventilated harness designed for both single and multi-pitch rock climbing. With innovative features including Warp Strength Technology, Spacermesh liner, four gear loops, and a handy quick-release hook on the rear leg elastic, you’ll be comfy at the crag all-day long.

  • Waistbelt is constructed from durable 150-denier honeycomb warp knit mono mesh with a Spacermesh™ liner to maximize breathability
  • Warp Strength Technology™ (WST) reduces bulk and evenly distributes pressure from edge to edge, resulting in a more comfortable and ergonomic fit
  • Ergonomic leg loops enhance fit and hanging comfort
  • Continuous leg loop construction improves flexibility for better mobility and comfort during climbs
  • Quick-release hook on the rear leg elastic allows for quick pit-stops without the need to remove the harness
  • For added convenience and extended harness life, the leg loop elastic is replaceable, and a transport and storage bag is included
name: Arc'teryx Skaha Harness - Women's
